text:
Hello everyone,
I need the email sent date in email template. Is it possible? if possible can you please help me out.
Thanks in advance

<@U01C13EEQ85>

Sounds like you’re a web developer that’s new to building HTML emails.

It’s a very different world from building for the web. <https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2017/01/introduction-building-sending-html-email-for-web-developers/>

I'm not aware of this being possible, since the date is determined at moment of send and it's not stored on any contact record to pull. I think you'd have to manually add the date into the email before sending.
